summary:
James Bond is a famous fictional character, a British spy created by Ian Fleming in 1953. Fleming wrote many books about Bond, and after his death, other authors continued the series. The character is also known as 007.

Bond has been adapted for various media, most famously the film series that began in 1962 with *Dr. No*, starring Sean Connery. The movies have been very successful, making over $7 billion. The latest film is *No Time to Die* (2021), with Daniel Craig as Bond.

The franchise is known for its themes, like cool cars, gadgets, and the "Bond girls."
title: James Bond
